Topic.Title: Unable to edit Quest gamebook online

Posts.EditableText: I have been creating a game online using the Quest gamebook option. However, I am now unable to edit the game, it just loads forever and never takes me into the editor. I can still play what I have made so far but as I say, I can no longer edit it. Any help would be much appreciated.
Posts.HTML: I have been creating a game online using the Quest gamebook option. However, I am now unable to edit the game, it just loads forever and never takes me into the editor. I can still play what I have made so far but as I say, I can no longer edit it. Any help would be much appreciated.

Posts.EditableText: That happens occasionally. It usually means the server is overloaded. If you try again later, it should work again but might take a little longer to load. If that doesn't help, try restarting your browser.
Posts.HTML: That happens occasionally. It usually means the server is overloaded. If you try again later, it should work again but might take a little longer to load. If that doesn't help, try restarting your browser.

Posts.EditableText: Thank you, I just tried this again but it hasn't worked, its still loading forever. It has been like this for like a week and I have tried deleting my history etc. but that hasn't worked either.
Posts.HTML: Thank you, I just tried this again but it hasn't worked, its still loading forever. It has been like this for like a week and I have tried deleting my history etc. but that hasn't worked either.
